text:
Zoran Krasić ("Зоран Красић"; 11 March 1956 – 12 April 2018) was a Serbian politician. He served several terms in the parliaments of Yugoslavia and Serbia as a member of the far-right Serbian Radical Party. He was Serbia's Minister of Trade, Tourism and Telecommunications from 1998 to 2000.
Krasić died on 12 April 2018, after a short illness in Belgrade at the age of 62.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Trade, Tourism and Telecommunications
